page.title: 03THE EFFECT OF THE OIL
page.content: Midmar has always been a rural area, most of the land being farmland.Some people have lived and worked here all their lives.Some farmers never moved far from the district, only to take their cows to mart on Fridays at Aberdeen or Alford.More people have moved into Midmar because of the oil discovered in the North Sea off Aberdeen.The oil companies such as BP Shell and Total have situated their bases in Aberdeen.Some of the oil peole prefer living in the country so builders are building bigger and more expensive houses for their benefit.The area has changed, in that a wholegroup of expensive houses has been built near the school and many old steadings and houses are being converted into large dwellings.
